title: How to use Vuetify with Nuxt 3 & Integrate Vuetifys mdi icons
description:
@ /plugins/vuetify.js

import { createVuetify } from 'uetify'/p>

import * as components from 'uetify/components'/p>

import * as directives from 'uetify/directives'/p>

export default defineNuxtPlugin(nuxtApp => {

const vuetify = createVuetify({

components,

directives,

})

nuxtApp.vueApp.use(vuetify)

})



@/ nuxt.config.ts

import { defineNuxtConfig } from 'nuxt'/p>

// https: //v3.nuxtjs.org/api/configuration/nuxt.config

export default defineNuxtConfig({

css: [ 'uetify/lib/styles/main.sass',

build: {

transpile: [ 'uetify',

},

vite: {

define: {

'rocess.env.DEBUG' false,

},

},

})


@/ nuxt.config.ts

import { defineNuxtConfig } from 'nuxt'/p>

export default defineNuxtConfig({

css: [

'@mdi/font/css/materialdesignicons.min.css',

],

})
